GLOBAL.title: General Filling Instructions
GLOBAL.instruction: The form must be filled in BLACK ink and in CAPITAL LETTERS. All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory.
rejections: Form not filled in capital letters
Form not filled using black ink

APP_DATE.title: Date of Application
APP_DATE.instruction: Enter today's date in DD-MM-YYYY format.

CUST_ID.title: Customer ID
CUST_ID.instruction: Enter your unique Customer ID (found in your chequebook or welcome letter).

ACC_NUMBER_TO_CLOSE.title: Account Number to Close
ACC_NUMBER_TO_CLOSE.instruction: Write the exact account number you wish to permanently close.
rejections: Account number mismatch with bank records

CUST_NAME.title: Customer Name
CUST_NAME.instruction: Write your full legal name as it appears in bank records.

PURPOSE_CLOSURE.title: Purpose of Closure
PURPOSE_CLOSURE.instruction: Briefly explain why you are closing this account (e.g., 'Consolidating accounts', 'Moving abroad').

PAYOUT_MODE_SELECT.title: Payout Mode Selection
PAYOUT_MODE_SELECT.instruction: Tick ONE box to choose how you want to receive the remaining balance: 'Electronic Transfer', 'Demand Draft', 'Internal Transfer', or 'Cash'.

PAYOUT_NEFT_DETAILS.title: Option 1: Transfer to Another Bank
PAYOUT_NEFT_DETAILS.instruction: Fill this ONLY if you chose 'Electronic Transfer'. Enter the details of YOUR account at another bank (Account No, Bank Name, IFSC). Note: You cannot transfer to a third party.

PAYOUT_DD_DETAILS.title: Option 2: Demand Draft
PAYOUT_DD_DETAILS.instruction: Tick this if you want a Demand Draft sent to your registered address. Note: It cannot be made out to a third party.
rejections: Selected but address not updated in records

PAYOUT_INTERNAL_DETAILS.title: Option 3: Transfer to IDFC Bank Account
PAYOUT_INTERNAL_DETAILS.instruction: Fill this ONLY if you have another existing IDFC FIRST Bank account. Enter that account number here.
rejections: Selected but IDFC account number missing

PAYOUT_CASH_DETAILS.title: Option 4: Cash Payout
PAYOUT_CASH_DETAILS.instruction: Tick this ONLY if the balance is below ₹20,000. If the balance is higher, you must choose another option.

DECLARATION_SIGNATURE_1.title: First Account Holder Signature
DECLARATION_SIGNATURE_1.instruction: Primary account holder must sign here. By signing, you confirm you have destroyed all unused cheques and cards linked to this account.

DECLARATION_SIGNATURE_2.title: Second Account Holder Signature
DECLARATION_SIGNATURE_2.instruction: If this is a joint account, the second holder must sign here.

DECLARATION_SIGNATURE_3.title: Third Account Holder Signature
DECLARATION_SIGNATURE_3.instruction: If this is a joint account, the third holder must sign here.

BANK_USE_ONLY.title: For Bank Use Only
BANK_USE_ONLY.instruction: This section must be completed by bank officials only, including service request number, employee details, branch information, and official signature.
